name: Skratch Labs Endurance Recovery Coffee
description: Skratch Labs set out to develop a delicious recovery drink with a rich coffee taste that was as beneficial to the body as a real meal, but without the hassle of cooking or chewing. This next generation adds a probiotic to aid protein absorption, as well as lactase to help people who have issues with milk products or lactose. Most recovery drinks are full of excess ingredients, but Endurance Recovery mix uses a select few ingredients full of easy-to-break-down proteins and sugars to give your body the fuel it needs, when it needs it most.Ingredients: cane sugar, whole milk, non-fat milk, dextrose, coffee extract, lactase, salt, Bacillus coagulans GBI-30 6086 (probiotic).Each serving contains 45mg of energizing caffeine.Certified Kosher.
